entry.title: $2200 // #@%Newly renovated 1.5 bedroom railroad apartment with original ♥☻
entry.content:
1.5 Bed / 1 Bath at 257 Himrod St, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Newly renovated 1.5 bedroom railroad apartment with original tin ceilings and brand new stainless steel appliances. Exposed shelves in kitchen, lots of closets and ample storage. The apartment has a total of four rooms, including kitchen, living room, office and bedroom. Located near Sally Roots, Variety Coffee, Heavy Woods and all the best the Bushwick neighborhood has to offer. Blocks away from Dekalb L and Knickerbocker M trains.


AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Natural Light in Living Area
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stone countertops

TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-88 and mention this ad. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask!

entry.title: $2650 // ^$3 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed♣♦
entry.content:
3 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Newly renovated 3 bedroom for a steal! Only a block from the L at Dekalb and a few blocks from the Knickerbocker M. Large bedrooms, sizable living space separate from the kitchen, and close to tons of great bars, restaurants, cafe's and the L and M trains!

AMENITIES
Exposed Brick
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Eat In Kitchen
